value.title: Safety driver in fatal Arizona Uber self-driving car crash charged with homicide
value.excerpt: The back-up safety driver behind the wheel of a self-driving Uber Technologies <UBER.N> test vehicle that struck and killed a woman in Tempe, Arizona, in 2018 was charged with negligent homicide, prosecutors said on Tuesday.

value.title: Sony’s new AI agent achieves superhuman Gran Turismo Sport scores
value.excerpt: One of the best things about computers is that they can learn just as much from a simulation as they can from so-called ‘real world’ experiences. That means, given the proper simulator, we can teach AI to drive cars without ever putting a single human in danger.

value.title: Baidu (BIDU) Expands Apollo Go Robotaxi Service to Beijing
value.excerpt: The company recently revealed that the Apollo Go Robotaxi service is now available in Beijing, China’s capital. value.title: Tesla Self-Driving Software Rewrite Should Be Available By End Of 2020: Musk

value.title: Idriverplus raises over $14.6 million for autonomous street cleaners and cars

value.title: When Wildfire Smoke And Ash Fill The Sky, Here’s How Self-Driving Cars Can Go Awry
value.excerpt: An especially eerie sight made the national and international news last week when the Bay Area and other surrounding locales became thick with smoke and ash, causing the skies to showcase a menacing red-orange glow and blotted out any semblance of a normal sky.

value.title: Researchers claim to develop concept to ensure ‘legal safety’ of driverless cars
value.excerpt: The algorithm attempts to verify that a driverless car will maintain “fail-safe trajectories at all times”, meaning they move at a speed and direction allowing them to avoid collisions with other vehicles being driven legally.

value.title: Is Ambarella an Underappreciated Artificial Intelligence Chip Stock?

value.title: Aeva Partners With Auto Supplier ZF to Produce Key Self-Driving Sensors
value.excerpt: (Reuters) - Aeva Inc, a Silicon Valley start-up working on a crucial sensor for self-driving vehicles, and German automotive industry supplier ZF Friedrichshafen AG said on Tuesday they were partnering to put the sensors into production.

value.title: Yandex Self Driving Group Gets $150 Million, Will Bring Autonomous Vehicles To U.S.
value.excerpt: Yandex is not cutting ties with its former autonomous vehicle team by any means. Yandex NV is going to invest $150 million into Yandex SDG ($100 million in equity, $50 million as a convertible loan) and Yandex NV will keep an eye on the autonomous vehicle technology progress and will keep reporting Yandex SDG's results in Yandex NV's "Other Bets and Experiments" segment.
